notes.text: Tried to get KoG with REZ because everyone was using Aliens and SSA and I wanted to show REZ was still tier 1 but I lost 3 rank up games bricking and then gave in and played aliens and only lost 1 game in the mirror due to bricking. REZ is still tier 1 but KoG with aliens was just so easy I just caved and played it in the end. REZ to Legend 3 and then Aliens to KoG.Aliens easiest deck to KoG with since tier 0 CA imo
